Field_Description: Per January 2025 OECD GloBE Information Return Template
Aligned with OECD XML Schema v2.0
Legal name of ultimate parent entity or group
DFE UPE or Designated Filing Entity
Name of entity filing the GIR
Corporate tax rate in UPE jurisdiction
Number of CEs in this jurisdiction

Field_Name: QDMTT SH only for qualified QDMTTs
All data for same fiscal period
All values match schema data types

Sheet_Name: 1. Complete Section 1 first - entity information is required for Sections 2 and 3
2. Enter Safe Harbour elections in Section 2 - qualifying jurisdictions bypass Section 3 detail
3. Complete Section 3 for each jurisdiction not covered by a safe harbour
4. Review Validation Dashboard - all checks must PASS before XML export
5. Use SBIE rates table to verify correct transitional rates applied
6. Summary section provides group-level totals for reconciliation
7. This calculator aligns with OECD January 2025 GIR template structure
8. Export to XML using dedicated conversion tools or platform integration
